title: About
text:
This site show the weather forecast of Montpellier
First of all i tried to get the data via Pooch retrieve and used this to get all the data I needed. I then printed them all to see them then tried to get them in multiple variable. I took hourly variable and took the max and min of temperatures, then made the mean of the wind speed per hour.
